name: CopyExt
description: Copy files with full micromatch support
author: Geek Learning

inputs.name: SourceFolder
inputs.label: Source Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The source folder that the copy pattern(s) will be run from.  Empty is the root of the repo.  Use [variables](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=550988) if files are not in the repo. Example: $(agent.builddirectory)

inputs.name: Contents
inputs.label: Contents
inputs.helpMarkDown: File paths to include as part of the copy. Supports multiple lines of minimatch patterns. [More Information](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=708389)

inputs.name: TargetFolder
inputs.label: Target Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target folder files will copy to. Use [variables](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=550988). Example: $(build.artifactstagingdirectory)

inputs.name: CleanTargetFolder
inputs.label: Clean Target Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Delete all existing files in target folder before copy

inputs.name: OverWrite
inputs.label: Overwrite
inputs.helpMarkDown: Replace existing file in target folder
